thread.section_title: MyUS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyUS.com | myus2.myus.com
thread.title: Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: Sadly I have told all my friends about this service, and I wish I didn't. Not only may they end up wasting there money, they may have to deal with the rude and unhelpful Jeylec, (he is not he only one I regret having dealt with). After being with this company for over a year and lots of money spent I'm going to be taking my business elsewhere. Australians choice has a good article about parcel forwarding services and the different companies, well worth reading great comparison site. I certainly wish I read it earlier.
